mapper.insert: insert into sea_co_type (tid, cid, tname, siteurl, getherday, playfrom, autocls, classid, coding, sock, addtime, cjtime, isok, cotype, listconfig, itemconfig) values (#{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteurl,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{getherday,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{playfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autocls,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{coding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sock,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cjtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isok,jdbcType=BIT}, #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{listconfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{itemconfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sea_co_type set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, tname = #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, siteurl = #{siteurl,jdbcType=CHAR}, getherday = #{getherday,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, playfrom = #{playfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, autocls = #{autocls,jdbcType=CHAR}, classid = #{classid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, coding = #{coding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sock = #{sock,jdbcType=CHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cjtime = #{cjtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isok = #{isok,jdbcType=BIT}, cotype = #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, listconfig = #{listconfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, itemconfig = #{itemconfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tid, cid, tname, siteurl, getherday, playfrom, autocls, classid, coding, sock, addtime, cjtime, isok, cotype, listconfig, itemconfig from sea_co_type where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
